title: [distributions] dirichlet pathwise gradient does not work well with .expand
body_html:
The issue happens in pytorch master: when the expanded shape has a singleton (1) dimension. Samples get constant values at some dimension. This does not happen in pytorch 0.4.
Here is the code to replicate the issue

import torch
c = torch.tensor([1., 1.])
a = torch.distributions.dirichlet._Dirichlet.apply(c.expand(2, 1, 2))
b = torch.distributions.dirichlet._Dirichlet.apply(c.expand(2, 1, 2))
print(bool((a[1, 0, :] == b[1, 0, :]).all()))  # <- always True

@SsnL @fritzo
